languages.text: {n}Маражай небрежно осматривает свой доспех на предмет повреждений — кажется, его вообще не взволновала попытка расправы.{/n}
{n}Marazhai is casually inspecting his armour for damage, seemingly unperturbed by the attempted reprisal against him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай небрежно осматривает свой доспех на предмет повреждений — кажется, его вообще не взволновала попытка расправы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋正漫不经心地检查着护甲受损的情况。即便是有人打算向他进行报复，他似乎也毫不在意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is casually inspecting his armour for damage, seemingly unperturbed by the attempted reprisal against him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは何事もなかったように防具に傷がついていないか確認しており、報復襲撃については何とも思っていないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is casually inspecting his armour for damage, seemingly unperturbed by the attempted reprisal against him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは何事もなかったように防具に傷がついていないか確認しており、報復襲撃については何とも思っていないようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai está inspeccionando distraídamente su armadura en busca de zonas dañadas; no parece que la represalia frustrada le haya perturbado en lo más mínimo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is casually inspecting his armour for damage, seemingly unperturbed by the attempted reprisal against him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avec une indifférence manifeste envers la tentative de représailles dont il a fait l'objet, Marazhai inspecte son armure endommagée comme si de rien n'était.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai inspiziert seine Rüstung ungerührt auf Schäden, scheinbar unbeirrt von der versuchten Vergeltungsmaßnahme gegen ihn.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, fark ettirmeden zırhında hasar olup olmadığına bakıyor. Kendisine yapılan misilleme girişimine karşı sakinliğini korumuş gibi duruyor.{/n}
